intro.text:
Based in Spain, I have a strong background in UX/UI, graphic design, web development, 3D art, motion graphics and videogame design. I have collaborated with renowned brands such as Volkswagen, Nissan, Ferrari, Bullpadel, and musical artists like Axolotes Mexicanos and Mala Gestión.

Although all my designs share an unique essence, I like to be versatile and experiment to adapt to the needs of each project. I am a very creative and proactive person who always has projects in mind. Even though I am very autonomous and independent, I enjoy working in a team and sharing experiences with colleagues who share the same passion as I do.

education.title: MASTER'S DEGREE IN INTERACTIVE DESIGN
additionalInfo: Responsible for the visual projections in the opera Carmen, a collaborative project involving all the art schools of Madrid.

highlights: 2023 Honours in Theory of the Image
additionalInfo: *The Honours is the maximum and extraordinary grade that can be obtained in a subject at University in Spain.

Selected by the III Iberoamerican Investigation and Design Forum to talk about my Bachelor’s Degree Thesis and the positive impact it had through sustainability and inclusivity in the University’s visual communication strategy (2025). Watch it here
Participation in the initiative "Development of High Intellectual Abilities at the University" (2023).
Student representative in the Fine Arts Faculty Board (2024-2025).
